function.name: mem_collection_create
function.description: Create a collection. Creates a new vector collection owned by the paying wallet address. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

name.description: Collection name. Must be unique per wallet.

function.name: mem_collection_list
function.description: List collections. Returns all collections owned by the paying wallet address. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of collections per page (1â€“100, default 20).

function.name: mem_collection_get
function.description: Get collection details. Returns details for a single collection including live document_count. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: mem_collection_delete
function.description: Delete a collection. Deletes a collection and all its documents. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: mem_upsert
function.description: Upsert documents. Embeds and stores documents in the collection. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: mem_query
function.description: Semantic query. Embeds the query text and searches the collection for semantically similar documents. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

text.description: Query text to embed and search.

top_k.description: Maximum number of results to return (default 10).

filter.description: Qdrant-native filter passthrough for metadata filtering.

function.name: mem_cache_put
function.description: Set cache entry. Stores a value under the given namespace and key. Price: $0.0001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

ttl.description: TTL in seconds. Omit or null for permanent.

function.name: mem_cache_get
function.description: Get cache entry. Returns the stored value for the given namespace and key. Price: $0.0001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: mem_cache_delete
function.description: Delete cache entry. Deletes the cache entry for the given namespace and key. Price: $0.0001 via x402 (USDC on Base).
